definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
in doubt/unsure of sth/unable to decide/indecisive

sentences.english: God forbid I assume LOL means “lots of love”.
sentences.chinese: 上帝不准我把LOL設想爲“許多愛”的英文縮寫。

sentences.english: You are not to scribble on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 不准你在牆上亂塗亂畫。

sentences.english: But you came back late again, your name is mud - you can't use the car for a whole month!
sentences.chinese: 你完全沒有信用，在這整整一個月裏不准你再用車。

sentences.english: What president had 36 dogs but would not let his slaves keep dogs?
sentences.chinese: 哪位總統自己有36條狗，卻不准他的家奴養狗？

sentences.english: Were they going to stop us from digging a ditch?

sentences.chinese: 她不准她的孩子們喫糖。

sentences.english: I say "No" to your hitching down to L. A. with Bob next week.
sentences.chinese: 我不准你下禮拜和鮑伯一起搭便車到洛杉磯。

sentences.english: I'm not sure what time you can reach him.
sentences.chinese: 我喫不准你什麼時候可以打電話找到他。

sentences.english: The incense life men watch with brother, mustnt she left home.
sentences.chinese: 金香命人看管帶弟，不准她離家。

sentences.english: The paper mainly solves the problem that the cut -lengths isn't accurate in middle & small OD welded steel pipe mill.
sentences.chinese: 本文宗旨是解決中小焊管機組強制機械定尺不准問題。

sentences.english: The Chongqing government is not allowing me to protect my property.
sentences.chinese: 重慶政府現在不准我保護我自己的財產。

sentences.english: Don't you dare do him the slightest harm!
I don't allow you to go to the station by train , which make you walk a long way.
sentences.chinese: 我更不准你坐車去火車站，而使你走很長的路。

sentences.english: I am not sure how he will react to such a straightforward answer.
sentences.chinese: 我喫不准他會對如此直率的回答作出什麼反應。

definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
to agree on three laws (idiom)/three-point covenant/(fig.) preliminary agreement/basic rules
